Name: Father Eric
Message: $hGood day my child, may the light of Yoba shine upon you.

Name: Joe
Message: Mr. Bones wanted me to take care of Mr. Cake for him while he deals with a corruption claim by this guy called Stubbs...$b#$hNo idea why the cat even bothers, everyone knows Mr. Cake is best doggo!

Name: June
Message: Shhh, just, keep it a secret okay? I'll explain it later...

Name: Lady Agness
Message: Ah, hello @, enjoying a stroll around the city are you?

Name: Lillith
Message: $sSorry love, but the store is closed right now, some bees got in and built a hive.

Name: Lincoln
Message: Welcome to the Sundrop Joja Mart. If you can't find something, we don't have it.

Name: Mr. Atticus Bones
Message: Oh, hi there. Sorry, I can't talk now. I'm doing some legal ressearch.

Name: Oleander
Message: I was hoping to do some shopping before heading over to the Park, but all the stores seem to be closed for now...

Name: Pearl Jin
Message: $hAh, a customer! Welcome, please have a look around!

Name: Poppy
Message: Oh hi, just watering my flowers, they need a lot of care you know?

Name: Spencer
Message: Sorry, cant talk right now, have to get this ring just right...

Name: Willow
Message: Oh, hello. I have to leave for an audition soon, but you're welcome to hang out for a while if you want...
